name: Incorporating Large Language Models (LLMs) into Transportation Safety Analytics and Equity
description: Raw data that from the NEUTC project entitled "Incorporating Large Language Models (LLMs) into Transportation Safety Analytics and Equity"

variableMeasured.name: Fatal Case Status
variableMeasured.description: Status of if the crash was fatal

variableMeasured.name: Fatal Case Status Text Format
variableMeasured.description: The completion of the crash text format

variableMeasured.name: DOT Case
variableMeasured.description: Case number relating to the crash

variableMeasured.name: Town Name
variableMeasured.description: Name of which town the crash took place

variableMeasured.name: Town Number
variableMeasured.description: Number for the town to be used in the LLM
